Class rlVertexBuffer

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.rlVertexBuffer
public class rlVertexBuffer extends Object
struct rlVertexBuffer {
    int elementCount;
    float *vertices;
    float *texcoords;
    float *normals;
    unsigned char *colors;
    unsigned int *indices;
    unsigned int vaoId;
    unsigned int vboId[5];
}
